title: Finally made plat.
body: After what seemed like an eternity,  bouncing from gold 2 to 1, to occasionally down to 3, I have finally made it out this morning. Can I get a pat on the butt gents, for some good games?

replies.body: Congratulations! I did the same thing!

> [{quoted}](name=G Master Hung,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=65GIEAo1,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-09-03T18:04:18.965+0000)
>
> Cool Now fix the game :)

If you notice Skip's TITLE, it reads: "Associate Narrative Writer". Not "Head of Balance", nor "Game Designer".

Being rude is tolerable, but being ignorant is just embarrassing.
Kudos! I am curious What Comp?

> [{quoted}](name=Kai Guy,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=65GIEAo1,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-09-04T18:00:52.464+0000)
>
> Kudos! I am curious What Comp?

I actually don't stick to any one comp. One thing I have learned from playing this game, is that you have to flexible. If you're not, you're going to have a bad time.

I'm trying too I had an insanely good streak and I needed 4 more wins in a row to hit plat but sadly rito matched me with their special needs force. Anyway good job hopefully I hit it too even though it's hard when u gain 16 to 17 lp and lose 19

> [{quoted}](name=Lets Find Dad,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=65GIEAo1,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-09-03T12:41:38.313+0000)
>
> After what seemed like an eternity,  bouncing from gold 2 to 1, to occasionally down to 3, I have finally made it out this morning. Can I get a pat on the butt gents, for some good games?

Get ready to be bouncing around in plat. Here I am in plat 2 and 4 like two or three times. I'm so close to drop to gold for the fourth time this summer as well.
